newsitem.title: PERU: Repsol to drill at Peru's Salaverry - news agency.
newsitem.headline: Repsol to drill at Peru's Salaverry - news agency.

text.p: Spanish oil company Repsol SA will drill a first exploratory well in January at its concession in the Salaverry basin near Peru's northern city of Trujillo, state news agency Andina said Monday.
Andina added that Repsol, which has been exploring there since the beginning of this year, planned to drill at least three wells at the site.
"The Spanish company guarantees an investment of $40 million if the results are favorable," Andina said.
